forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High around 15C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High near 60F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
